name: RUINS (xmertsahinx)
description:
Ruins is a bite sized action adventure game made for Indiepocalypse issue 21 and heavily influenced by PoP:WW. Control Eve through ancient ruined city and try to reach the treasury. Kill skeletons to replenish health and arrow. Use your special ability and slow the time to get pass traps.

PRESS:

WASD to move

Left Click to attack

Right Click to aim

E to draw

Q to interact

F to slow time

Alt to Crouch

Alt double tap to roll

Ctrl to walk-run 

INSTALLATION:

Unrar the file and double click to runyrun.exe. It may take several seconds to load levels, please be patient; it's not stuck. If you feel stuttering and lagging, please consider to lower graphics option.

It's my first gamejam project and i'm happy to publish it even if it's not perfect. Feel free to leave a comment.
